value.message: Variable 'p' in map callback is a single-character name not used as a counter.
value.suggestion: Rename 'p' to 'product' for clarity and to better express its purpose.

value.message: Delete operation uses predictable sequential id from client-side without backend ownership verification, risking IDOR vulnerability.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend verifies resource ownership before allowing delete; use UUIDs or encrypted IDs instead of sequential numbers.
